optOut.waitForThenClick: body > div#cookie-law-info-bar > span:not([id]) > div:not([id]) > div:nth-child(2):not([id]) > a#cookie_action_close_header_reject

test.waitForVisible: body > div#cookie-law-info-bar > span:not([id]) > div:not([id]) > div:nth-child(2):not([id]) > a#cookie_action_close_header_reject
